sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { motion } from "framer-motion" import { FaMapMarkerAlt, FaRegClock, FaExclamationTriangle, FaCity, FaMoon, FaSun, AiOutlineBarChart, MdOutlineTimer, BsGraphUp, FaUsers, FaMobileAlt, } from "react-icons/all" import "./LandingPage.css" const LandingPage = () => { const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(true) const [scrollY, setScrollY] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => setScrollY(window.scrollY) window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll) document.documentElement.classList.add("dark") return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll) }, []) const toggleTheme = () => { setIsDarkMode(!isDarkMode) document.documentElement.classList.toggle("dark") } const scrollToSection = (sectionId) => { document.getElementById(sectionId)?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }) } const features = [ { icon: , title: "Live Tracking", description: "Real-time bus position, speed, and ETA displayed on an interactive map." }, { icon: , title: "Smart Timetable", description: "View daily and weekly schedules with delays and disruptions highlighted." }, { icon: , title: "Emergency Alerts", description: "Instant notifications for breakdowns, route changes, or emergency situations." }, { icon: , title: "Change City", description: "Seamlessly switch between different cities and routes with ease." }, { icon: , title: "Theme Toggle", description: "Personalize your experience with dark and light theme options.", action: toggleTheme }, { icon: , title: "Analytics Dashboard", description: "Comprehensive graphs for time vs distance, speed, stops, and passenger load." }, ] const benefits = [ { icon: , title: "Save Travel Time", description: "Get accurate ETAs and plan your journey with confidence. No more waiting at bus stops wondering when your bus will arrive." }, { icon: , title: "Improve City Transport", description: "Help operators optimize routes and schedules with data-driven insights, making public transport more efficient for everyone." }, { icon: , title: "Enhanced Commuter Experience", description: "Enjoy a stress-free commute with real-time updates, emergency alerts, and personalized journey planning." }, ] return (
{/* Navigation */}
Bus-Karo
{/* Hero Section */}

Smarter Bus Tracking.
Smoother Journeys.

Real-time bus monitoring and tracking system with simulation and analytics. Track buses live, get predictive insights, and make your commute more efficient.

(window.location.href = "/dashboard")}> Track a Bus Now → scrollToSection("demo")}> ▶ Request Demo
{/* Remaining sections (mission, features, benefits, demo, final CTA, footer) */} {/* You can keep the same JSX structure from your previous code. */}
) } export default LandingPage
